Luis Enrique: "Next year? I'll be in the stands watching all Barça games."

"Will I keep tabs on Real Madrid game tomorrow? Yes but my prime focus is on our game."

"I came here as a player, I am not only a Culé but I love being here in Catalunya."

"Wembley? I can't even remember what I did 3 days ago. You want me to remember so far back? (Laughs) no of course it's special."

"Promoting La Masia? The players have to be ready and some are."

"Am I sad? I decided I needed a rest. I am 100% dedicated to sport and it's come to my last stage here."

"My time has come to an end. It's a positive end to my time. I want to concentrate on my personal life."

"How will I be remembered? Grab the microphone and go ask the fans."

"I'm not going to say I won't be interested in the Malaga game but I'm going to focus on my team. I will check scores."

"I am so grateful for everything Barcelona has given me."

"We will give our best tomorrow and hope for the best outcome."

Luis Enrique: "Next year? I'll be in the stands watching all Barça games."

"Will I keep tabs on Real Madrid game tomorrow? Yes but my prime focus is on our game."

"I came here as a player, I am not only a Culé but I love being here in Catalunya."

"Wembley? I can't even remember what I did 3 days ago. You want me to remember so far back? (Laughs) no of course it's special."

"Promoting La Masia? The players have to be ready and some are."

"Am I sad? I decided I needed a rest. I am 100% dedicated to sport and it's come to my last stage here."

"My time has come to an end. It's a positive end to my time. I want to concentrate on my personal life."

"How will I be remembered? Grab the microphone and go ask the fans."

"I'm not going to say I won't be interested in the Malaga game but I'm going to focus on my team. I will check scores."

"I am so grateful for everything Barcelona has given me."

"We will give our best tomorrow and hope for the best outcome."
